Class MedicalRecord

java.lang.Object
MedicalRecord
public class MedicalRecord extends Object
The MedicalRecord class is a container ("bag) for storing patient records. It allows for adding, finding, and removing patients, as well as managing their visit history.

  • Method Details

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Grows the patient array dynamically when it's full. Starts with an empty array and doubles its size when needed.

    • addPatient

      public boolean addPatient(Profile profile)
      Adds a new patient to the MedicalRecord.
      Parameters:
      profile - the profile of the patient to be added
      Returns:
      true if the patient is successfully added

    • findPatient

      public Patient findPatient(Profile profile)
      Finds a patient in the MedicalRecord based on their profile.
      Parameters:
      profile - the profile of the patient to find
      Returns:
      the Patient if found, null otherwise

    • addVisit

      public boolean addVisit(Profile profile, Appointment appointment)
      Adds a visit for an existing patient.
      Parameters:
      profile - the profile of the patient
      appointment - the appointment to add as a visit
      Returns:
      true if the visit is successfully added, false if the patient is not found

    • removePatient

      public boolean removePatient(Profile profile)
      Removes a patient from the MedicalRecord.
      Parameters:
      profile - the profile of the patient to remove
      Returns:
      true if the patient is successfully removed, false if the patient is not found
